SEARCH
Package coding201.code

Class Stadium

java.lang.Object
coding201.code.Stadium
public class Stadium extends Object
Stadium Stadium is the object that contains all the stats about the player's club and holds the hadhtable for the possible opponents. The opponent hashtable can be filled with random teams.
Version:
1.0
Author:
tve21, bro82

    • fillOpponentTable

      Returns:
      HashTable

    • checkEnd

      public boolean checkEnd(Store store)
      Takes the club balance, and finds the cheapest player in the store. The two values are compared and if the club balance is lower than the cheapest price and there are not enough players to start a match, true is returned. Otherwise false.
      Parameters:
      store - an instance of a store class
      Returns:
      boolean
